title: Textile
medium: Technique: handwoven, plain weave with supplementary warp
inscribed: 1.Trude Guermonprez business card sewn to fabric. Also written on card was, "UPHOLSTERY FABRIC 22.00 PER YD." 2.Handwritten hanging cardboard tag, "UPHOLSTRY FABRIC TRUDE GUERMONPREZ"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 256.5 x 64.8 cm (8 ft. 5 in. x 25 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Two blocks of a dark grey basket weave with small squares formed by a black supplementary warp. One end with deep warp fringe.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Technique: handwoven, plain weave with supplementary warp. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-34.
